frontmatter.title: Scroll

children.value: Class name for in animation done
Class name for inverse direction activation
Skip class activation and deactivation, can be one or more booleans ex:
{ elements: true, elementsInner: true, targets: true, targetsInner: true }
You can start with toggled elements and targets just by adding
one of the class names for activation
Additionally on component initialization the attribute
activation and deactivation distance. For percent use
distance from top and bottom for elements that are too close to window's top or bottom.
Activation distance from window's top and bottom
Fallback distance when too close to the start and end of the page
for a delay on activation and deactivation.
Activation trigger distance viewport's top and bottom
Activation start distance viewport's top and bottom
Activation end distance viewport's top and bottom
Fallback distance when too close to the start and end of the page
You can block the activations with the class
